title: Generated Social Media Post
description: Schema for a generated social media post, including text and optional image generation details.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the post was created. Will use current time if not specified.

post_text.description: The main text content of the post. No hashtags or user mentions.

image_keywords.description: Keywords for image generation. Include generic keywords like 'brown hair', 'tall woman', etc.

image_negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements in the generated image.
